title: Greater Christchurch Regeneration Bill introduced (New Zealand Government)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Government ) Canterbury Earthquake Recovery Minister Gerry Brownlee says today marks a significant step in the regeneration of greater Christchurch , with the introduction of legislation to replace the Canterbury
